title: Looking to create a team
body:
Looking to create a team to play with in ranked,
currently have a silver top laner and myself as ADC, no pressure on solo q ranks just come play have fun and grow as a player, message ThreshXG for more info, and please play often :)

replies.body:
im an ADC main but i also play alot of jungle. 
Please consider C:
Add me in game

Im a Mid lane main, can play jg and support as well

Azir main
